description: cmd/api: normalize byte to uint8 and rune to int32

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

Thanks.

On Thu, Jan 24, 2013 at 2:13 PM,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> What prompted this?

https://codereview.appspot.com/7197046/

cgo w/ godefs option at tip translates both byte/uint8 into uint8
but previous one outputs byte.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f744ca9bba43 ***

cmd/api: normalize byte to uint8 and rune to int32

R=golang-dev, adg, mikioh.mikioh
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7195049

subject: code review 7195049: cmd/api: normalize byte to uint8 and rune to int32
